alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Lower Brewster County; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Brewster and southeastern Presidio Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 647 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Terlingua, or 19 miles north of Lajitas, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lajitas, Terlingua, Study Butte and Barton Warnock Environmental Educational Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Lower Brewster County; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley
